snippet: John McAfee, who disappeared from his home last month after the police there called him a “person of interest” in their investigation into the murder of his neighbor, has resurfaced in Guatemala City.
lead_paragraph: John McAfee, who disappeared from his home last month after the police there called him a “person of interest” in their investigation into the murder of his neighbor, has resurfaced in Guatemala City.

headline.seo: After Fleeing Belize, John McAfee Seeks Asylum in Guatemala
headline.main: After Fleeing Belize, Software Pioneer Seeks Asylum  in Guatemala
headline.print_headline: Guatemala: After Fleeing Belize, Software Pioneer Seeks Asylum
